name: Five nights at Pizza Boi's
description:
THIS GAME INCLUDES LOUD NOISES AND JUMPSCARES. IF YOU LIKE JUMPSCARES, CRANK YOUR VOLUME TO 100 AND WEAR HEADPHONES

Spend 5 nights at Pizza Boi's pizzeria. But you're not alone, the animatronics that entertain during the day walks around at night, especially to you.

 This is a Five nights at Freddy's fangame and made using Scratch, a children's coding platform so it isn't a good quality fangame but if you want to check it out, please do so.

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/520096105/
